description: This file provides example code and utility functions for integrating quiz functionality with a backend API, including fetching quiz data, submitting answers, and adapting data formats between backend and frontend.

methods.name: adaptBackendQuizToFrontend
methods.description: Converts backend quiz data into frontend quiz format with question options and correct answer flags.

methods.name: adaptFrontendAnswersToBackend
methods.description: Converts user answers from frontend format into backend answer indices array.
